mapper.select: SELECT dept_id AS deptId, parent_id AS parentId, ancestors AS ancestors, dept_name AS deptName, order_num AS orderNum, status AS status, create_by AS createBy, create_time AS createTime, update_by AS updateBy, update_time AS updateTime, del_flag AS delFlag from sys_dept where find_in_set(ancestors, #{deptId}) or dept_id = #{deptId}
